matches.explanation: Exact match: Red Team's 'S3 bucket storing CI/CD artifacts lacks encryption configuration, potentially exposing sensitive build artifacts and deployment files' on aws_s3_bucket.ci_artifacts was detected as 'Missing S3 Bucket Access Controls' on aws_s3_bucket.ci_artifacts

Exact match: Red Team's 'IAM policy grants access to all S3 buckets instead of limiting to specific CI/CD artifact bucket' on aws_iam_role_policy.pipeline_policy was detected as 'Overly Permissive S3 and CodeCommit Permissions' on aws_iam_role_policy.pipeline_policy

Partial match: Red Team's 'No audit logging configured for CI/CD artifact bucket, preventing security audit trail of access and modifications' on aws_s3_bucket.ci_artifacts was partially detected as 'Missing S3 Bucket Encryption' on aws_s3_bucket.ci_artifacts
